text.__SUMMARY__:
Pseudostachyum polymorphum is an Asian species of bamboo in the grass family.It is the only known species of the genus Pseudostachyum. The plant is found in Assam, Arunachal Pradesh, Bhutan, Myanmar, Vietnam, Thailand, and southern China (Yunnan, Guangdong, Guangxi).
Formerly includedsee Melocalamus Neohouzeaua

Pseudostachyum compactiflorum - Melocalamus compactiflorus
Pseudostachyum glomeriflorum - Melocalamus compactiflorus
Pseudostachyum helferi - Neohouzeaua helferi
